resources.string: Honor Read requires access to the storage and Phone permissions to purchase, read and download the e-books.
For avoid missing message, push is opened. You can go " Settings ">" Apps ">" Honor Reader ">" Notifications " to close it.
During use, this app requires access to the Internet. The following information will also be collected and processed:
· Device information, including IMEI, IMSI, MEID, MAC, ICCID, AndroidID, Model.
to customize contents. You can terminate information collection and upload activities by exiting this app.
The contents of this app is provided by China Reading Corp., Ltd.

Original QQ network disk is newly upgraded to Weiyun, and you may easily synchronize the books in your computer and your smartphone through Weiyun without having to use a data cable to import the books. Download the books in the Weiyun customer-end, tap "use other applications to open," select "
," this book will open and automatically e added to the bookshelf.

This plug-in is launched through cooperation with the Kingsoft wps smartphone office. After installation, you can use it to read Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files. The plug-in supports doc, docx, xls, xlsx, ppt, and pptx formats. The functions are continue to be optimized. Please forgive us if you have experienced problems.
